attributes.action: free the 11th Panchen Lama from house arrest in China
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 11th Panchen Lama, Gedun Choekyi Nyima  was taken, with his parents and put under house arrest at the age of 6 after being recognised by the Dalai Lama as the 11th Panchen Lama. The Panchen Lama is the 2nd most important spiritual leader next to the Dalai Lama in Buddhism and the teachings of compassion and non-violence. We ask the Prime Minister to put pressure on China to release the 11th Panchen Lama, and make people aware of this situation.
